Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Berg amendment (A050) Agreed to by recorded vote: 232 - 183 (Roll no. 493).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A050) offered by Mr. Berg.

description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following:    SEC.__. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to reduce the number of the following nuclear weapons delivery vehicles of the United States:    (1) Heavy bomber aircraft.    (2) Air-launched cruise missiles.    (3) Nuclear-powered ballistic missile submarines.    (4) Submarine-launched ballistic missiles.    (5) Intercontinental ballistic missiles.
purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to reduce the number of the following nuclear weapons delivery vehicles of the United States: (1) Heavy bomber aircraft; (2) Air-launched cruise missiles; (3) Nuclear-powered ballistic missile submarines; (4) Submarine-launched ballistic missiles; and (5) Intercontinetal ballistic missiles.
